top.title: Venezuela calls Trump airspace closure warning 'colonialist threat'
top.summary: US President Donald Trump said the airspace around Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety".

top.title: Flooding across Asia leaves 600 dead and hundreds missing
top.summary: The region is hit by some of the worst floods in years, with millions affected in Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand and Sri Lanka.

top.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
top.summary: The two ships struck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

top.title: Barcelona distances itself from sponsor's cryptocurrency after backlash
top.summary: Experts say the deal may put fans at risk as the Catalan club tries to relieve its financial woes.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".
